channel.title: Axelrod's tournament (2018) :: Rik's Treehouse
channel.description: In the early 1980s Robert Axelrod invited colleagues to submit strategies to a series of round-robin tournaments to see which strategies would do well playing an iterated Prisoner’s Dilemma. This NetLogo model allows you to try Axelrod’s tournaments yourself by creating some strategies and testing them in an iterated Prisoner’s Dilemma.
